trans-unit.source: Represents a try/catch/finally/fault block.
trans-unit.target: 代表 try/catch/finally/fault 區塊。

trans-unit.source: The body block is protected by the try block.
trans-unit.target: 內文區塊受 try 區塊。

trans-unit.source: The handlers consist of a set of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock> expressions that can be either catch statements or filters.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式所組成的一組<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock>運算式可以是 catch 陳述式或篩選。

trans-unit.source: The fault block runs if an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果擲回例外狀況，則會執行 fault 區塊。

trans-unit.source: The finally block runs regardless of how control exits the body.
trans-unit.target: Finally 區塊會執行不論控制項如何結束主體。

trans-unit.source: Only one of fault or finally blocks can be supplied.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供只有其中一個錯誤或 finally 區塊。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the try block must match the return type of any associated catch statements.
trans-unit.target: Try 區塊的傳回型別必須符合任何相關聯的 catch 陳述式的傳回型別。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression> object that contains a catch statement by using the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.TryCatch%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression>物件，其中包含 catch 陳述式使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.TryCatch%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> representing the body of the try block.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 try 區塊主體的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> representing the body of the try block.
trans-unit.target: 表示 try 區塊主體的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> representing the fault block.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 fault 區塊的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> representing the fault block.
trans-unit.target: 表示 fault 區塊的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> representing the finally block.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 finally 區塊的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> representing the finally block.
trans-unit.target: 表示 finally 區塊的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock" /> expressions associated with the try block.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 try 區塊相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock" /> 運算式集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock" /> expressions associated with the try block.
trans-unit.target: 與 try 區塊相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock" /> 運算式集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node type of this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的節點型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> that represents this expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the static type of the expression that this <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得此 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 代表之運算式的靜態類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Type" /> that represents the static type of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表運算式靜態類型的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Body" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 結果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Body" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Handlers" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 結果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Handlers" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Finally" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 結果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Finally" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Fault" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 結果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Fault" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
trans-unit.target: 建立類似這個運算式的新運算式，但使用提供的子系。

trans-unit.source: If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有子系都相同，則會傳回這個運算式。

trans-unit.source: This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
trans-unit.target: 如果未變更任何子系，則為這個運算式；否則為已更新子系的運算式。
